anime.description: Stop motion shorts that feature dolls in a surreal world for girls.

tag.name: stop motion
tag.description: Stop motion (also known as stop-action or frame-by-frame) is an animation technique to make a physically manipulated object appear to move on its own. The object is moved in small increments between individually photographed frames, creating the illusion of movement when the series of frames is played as a continuous sequence.

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

episode.title: パンプキンパイっていいにくいよね!
Pumpkin Pie Is Hard to Say!
Pumpkin Piette Ii Nikui yo ne!
episode.summary: The story takes place in a certain ordinary town where it is natural for everyone to wear an animal costume head. It depicts the everyday life of the main character MILPOM and her friends who live there, filled with the essence of Kawaii and a little bit cynical girls. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夢を語ると「中二病」と誹られ, 将来を語ると「意識高い」と疎まれるのが現実だよね?
Isn`t It a Reality That You`ll Be Likened to a Smartmouthed Adolescent If You Speak of Your Dreams and That You`ll be Shunned for Being Snobbish If You Talk About Your Future?
Yume o Kataru to "Chuunibyou" to Soshirare, Shourai o Kataru to "Ishiki Takai" to Utomareru no ga Genjitsu Da yo ne?
episode.summary: MILPOM, SILKY, CACAO and HAPPY unveil their ambitions, one-by-one, as they’re interviewed on the street in Harajuku…! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 好きになった人がタイプですってそれ都市伝説だよね?
Your Type Is Up to Who You Fall For. Is That an Urban Legend?
Suki ni Natta Hito ga Type Desutte Sore ga Toshidensetsu Da yo ne?
episode.summary: SILKY, CACAO, and HAPPY visit the café where MILPOM works part-time. They chat about their ideal type of men, which turns into a crazy girl talk! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 七面鳥ってどんな鳥かよくわかんないよね!
What Kind of Bird Is a Turkey Anyway?!
Shichimenchoutte Donna Tori ka Yoku Wakannai yo ne!
episode.summary: When Christmas is fast approaching, MILPOM and her friends visit the nail salon that HAPPY recommends. They wait for their turn too long and an unexpected happening occurs! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 将来の夢 MILPOM ver.
Dreams for the Future: Milpom Version
Shuurai no Yume: Milpom Ver.
将来の夢 SILKY ver.
Dreams for the Future: Silky Version
Shuurai no Yume: Silky Ver.
将来の夢 CACAO ver.
Dreams for the Future: Cocoa Version
Shuurai no Yume: Cocoa Ver.
将来の夢 HAPPY ver.
Dreams for the Future: Happy Version
Shuurai no Yume: Happy Ver.
レシピ動画って見てるだけで料理が上手くなった気がするよね?
Doesn`t Simply Watching Cooking Videos Make You Feel Like You`re a Master Chef?
Recipe Dougatte Miteru dake de Ryouri ga Umaku Natta Ki ga Suru yo ne?
episode.summary: The foursome of MILPOM, SILKY, CACAO and HAPPY challenge to make a character-themed lunch as it`s so popular today. Their kyara-ben, be delicious! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自分のルーツとか考え始めると一日が24時間じゃ足りなくなってくるよね?
When You Start to Wonder About Your Roots, Is Thinking 24/7 Ever Enough?
Jibun no Roots toka Kangaehajimeru to Ichinichi ga 24 Jikan ja Tarinakunatte Kuru yo ne?
episode.summary: MILPOM, SILKY, CACAO and HAPPY hold a photo session in the woods, brandishing their smartphones. While they`re totally into their shooting, HAPPY disappears all of a sudden. A certain doom falls on MILPOM and the others! Can the four girls survive it!? Source: crunchyroll
